name: Kill The Kingpin
description:
Brief:

A short game where you have to fight your way through some henchmen to kill the kingpin.

Controls:
  • WASD: Walk Around
  • Left Click: Machine Gun
  • Right Click: Shotgun
  • Hold Space: Enter Teleport Mode
  • Release Space: Leave Teleport Mode
  • R: Reset Level
Having Performance Problems?

If the game runs poorly for you, press ‘p’ to toggle off advanced post-processing. This will improve performance, though the exact gain will vary depending on your hardware configuration.
